thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 13 of 517
thread.title: WENDY H.

author: WENDY H.
title: WENDY H.
text:
Over six months ago, I purchased some daily contact lenses from OPTi contacts.
In December, I saw my ophthalmologist and was given a different prescription.
Four of the boxes of 30 Contacts each were not opened. Opticontacts.com gave me a full refund for those boxes after I had ordered my new contact prescription.
The contact store that is associated with my Eye doctor would only have allowed returns for larger quantities ( an unopened bundle of 9 boxes of 30 contacts each )
I am very happy with the customer service and discount pricing and will continue to use opticontacts.com.
